targets.query:
from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature" or r._measurement == "flow")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "DHW_INLET" or r._field == "DHW_OUTLET" or r._field == "FLOW_DHW")
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
   |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode: "by")
   |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
   |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with Q_DHW: 4.18*(998.0/3600.0*r.FLOW_DHW)*(r.DHW_OUTLET-r.DHW_INLET)
   }))
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_DHW"])
   |> group()
   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, column: "Q_DHW")
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_DHW"])

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature" or r._measurement == "flow")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "PVT_OUT" or r._field == "PVT_IN" or r._field == "FLOW_PVT")
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
   |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode: "by")
   |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
   |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with Q_PVT: (3.6014+0.004*(r.PVT_IN + r.PVT_OUT)/2.0 - 0.000002*((r.PVT_IN + r.PVT_OUT)/2.0)^2.0)*((1049.0- 0.475*(r.PVT_IN + 
      r.PVT_OUT)/2.0-0.0018*((r.PVT_IN + r.PVT_OUT)/2.0)^2.0)/3600.0*r.FLOW_PVT)*(r.PVT_OUT - r.PVT_IN)
   }))
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_PVT"])
   |> group()
   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, column: "Q_PVT")
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_PVT"])

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature" or r._measurement == "flow")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "PVT_IN_TO_SOLAR_BUFFER" or r._field == "PVT_OUT_FROM_SOLAR_BUFFER" or r._field == "FLOW_PVT")
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "THREE_WAY_SOLAR_OPERATION"])
   |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode: "by")
   |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time", "THREE_WAY_SOLAR_OPERATION"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
   |> map(
       fn: (r) => ({r with Q_PVT_SOLAR_BUFFER:
           if r.THREE_WAY_SOLAR_OPERATION == "False" then (3.6014+0.004*(r.PVT_IN_TO_SOLAR_BUFFER+r.PVT_OUT_FROM_SOLAR_BUFFER)/2.0 - 0.000002*((r.PVT_IN_TO_SOLAR_BUFFER+r.PVT_OUT_FROM_SOLAR_BUFFER)/2.0)^2.0)*((1049.0- 0.475*(r.PVT_IN_TO_SOLAR_BUFFER+r.PVT_OUT_FROM_SOLAR_BUFFER)/2.0-0.0018*((r.PVT_IN_TO_SOLAR_BUFFER+r.PVT_OUT_FROM_SOLAR_BUFFER)/2.0)^2.0)/3600.0*r.FLOW_PVT)*(r.PVT_IN_TO_SOLAR_BUFFER+r.PVT_OUT_FROM_SOLAR_BUFFER)
           else 0.0 }),
    )
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_PVT_SOLAR_BUFFER"])
   |> group()
   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, column: "Q_PVT_SOLAR_BUFFER" )
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_PVT_SOLAR_BUFFER"])

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature" or r._measurement == "flow")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "PVT_IN_TO_DHW" or r._field == "PVT_OUT_FROM_DHW" or r._field == "FLOW_PVT")
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "THREE_WAY_SOLAR_OPERATION"])
   |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode: "by")
   |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time", "THREE_WAY_SOLAR_OPERATION"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
   |> map(
       fn: (r) => ({r with Q_PVT_DHW:
           if r.THREE_WAY_SOLAR_OPERATION == "True" then (3.6014+0.004*(r.PVT_IN_TO_DHW + r.PVT_OUT_FROM_DHW)/2.0 - 0.000002*((r.PVT_IN_TO_DHW + r.PVT_OUT_FROM_DHW)/2.0)^2.0)*((1049.0- 0.475*(r.PVT_IN_TO_DHW + r.PVT_OUT_FROM_DHW)/2.0 -0.0018*((r.PVT_IN_TO_DHW + r.PVT_OUT_FROM_DHW)/2.0)^2.0)/3600.0*r.FLOW_PVT)*(r.PVT_IN_TO_DHW - r.PVT_OUT_FROM_DHW)
           else 0.0 }),
    )
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_PVT_DHW"])
   |> group()
   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, column: "Q_PVT_DHW")
   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Q_PVT_DHW"])

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "control")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "other")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "EEV_LOAD1" or r._field ==  "EEV_LOAD2")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "other" and r._field == "Compressor_HZ")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "flow")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pressure")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature")
    |> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "mult_source_heatpump")
|> range(start: -30d)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "checkpoints")
|> keep( columns: [ "id", "_field", "_value", "_time"] )
|> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last)
|> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
